instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: Looking for connector - Sam Connector
threads.message:
SPI+SWD SAM Connector

DF40PC-12DP-0.4V-51

can anyone tell me where I can buy them, 

thank you!

threads.title: Looking for connector - Sam Connector
threads.message: Why would you need that? It is not needed for the board to work. Also if you really need J6100 then a donor board would be the best place to get it.

threads.title: Looking for connector - Sam Connector
threads.message: We remove IFE, and need multiple ones :/

threads.title: Looking for connector - Sam Connector
threads.message: IFE? If you want the contra connector to flash the ROM you need something else.

threads.title: Looking for connector - Sam Connector
threads.message: We already do this, we have the tool and everything, I just need to get more of these connectors :/

threads.title: Looking for connector - Sam Connector
threads.message:
I assume you are looking for the receptacle and not the header like the one on the board.

[url]https://www.digikey.com/product-detail/en/hirose-electric-co-ltd/DF40C-2.0-12DS-0.4V-58/H124597CT-ND/5155900[/url]

threads.title: Looking for connector - Sam Connector
threads.message:
this is the one that I need, but they out of stock

[url]https://www.digikey.com/product-detail/en/hirose-electric-co-ltd/DF40C-12DP-0.4V-51/DF40C-12DP-0.4V-51-ND/4282868[/url]

threads.title: Looking for connector - Sam Connector
threads.message: Mouser has them in stock. I still do not understand why you need these, every board already has one.

threads.title: Looking for connector - Sam Connector
threads.message: The 27 inch imacs and most imac do not have them on their boards
